game.name: 0 to 10 by 1 or 2
game.rules: The initial value is 0. Players take turns adding either 1 or 2 to the current value. You may not add a number to the current value if the resulting value will be greater than 10, e.g., you may not add 2 if the current value is 9. You win if you add either 1 or 2 to the current value and the resulting value is 10.

variant.name: End State
variant.description: The final state can be a number other than 10.

variant.name: Addend Set
variant.description: Players can add any number from an arbitrary set of numbers.
